tool_description: The Domain Logo Scraper API is a tool that automatically extracts a website's logo from its domain. With this API, users can retrieve a website's logo without the need for manual searching, making it a valuable tool for web developers, marketers, and designers.
name: Domain Logo Scraper API
title: Domain Logo Scraper API

api_list.name: Logo Extractor
api_list.description: This endpoint will allow you to extract the Logo from any domain of your preference.
